title: Action to support system reliability - impact

content.question: A programmer developed a mobile application that is intended for users around the world. The programmer wants to maximize the application’s system reliability. Which of the following actions is most likely to support this goal?

choices.label: Applying security measures to safeguard the personal privacy of users
Testing the application under a wide variety of possible conditions
Using  public  visibility for the attributes used in the application
Using  public  visibility for the behaviors used in the application

content.answer: Testing the application under a wide variety of possible conditions

skill.text: 5.A: Explain how computing impacts society, economy, and culture.
